sect1.title: What is Gallery Remote?
sect1.para: Gallery Remote is a desktop file upload utility for Gallery. It enables easy batch uploading of images to a Gallery installation, without the need to use the Gallery Web Interface.
Best used in conjunction with Gallery 1.3.2 and later due to changes in the Gallery Remote Protocol.

Features
Multiple image upload
Drag'n'drop support
Image preview
Image resizing
New album creation
Multiple Gallery installs
Gallery Remote is licensed under the GPL.
